`as: :radio_bottons` adds hidden field which raises `ActionController::BadRequest` on submit #22773

Open
rafaelfranca opened this Issue Dec 23, 2015 · 1 comment

Labels

actionview

Milestone

  5.0.0

Assignee

No one assigned

1 participant

Owner
rafaelfranca commented Dec 23, 2015

From @ssendev on December 23, 2015 17:10

steps to reproduce:

rails _5.0.0.beta1_ new rails-form-test
cd rails-form-test
echo "gem 'simple_form'" >> Gemfile
bundle
rails g simple_form:install --bootstrap
rails g scaffold foo bar baz
rails db:migrate
# in `app/views/foos/_form.html.erb` replace `f.input :bar` with `f.input :bar, collection: [:laa, :dee, :daa], as: :radio_buttons`
rails s
# go to localhost:3000/foos/new and submit

when bar is not selected it works when bar is checked ActionController::BadRequest (Invalid request parameters: expected Array (got String) for param 'bar') is raised, which is caused because foo[bar]=laa and foo[bar][] are submitted

in previous versions the hidden field seems not to be present so a workaround is to use include_hidden: false

Copied from original issue: plataformatec/simple_form#1334

Owner
rafaelfranca commented Dec 23, 2015

It is a Rails bug. I'll move it to its issue tracker.
